mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select ROWNUM as recNum, lvl, articleNO, parentNO, title, id, writeDate from (select LEVEL as LVL, articleNO, parentNO, title, id, writeDate from t_board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC) ) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(articleNO, parentNO, id, title, content, imageFileName) values(#{articleNO}, #{parentNO}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, null)

insert.foreach: INTO t_imageFile(imageFileNO, imageFileName, articleNO, regDate) VALUES (#{item.imageFileNO}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.articleNO}, sysdate)

mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in ( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board START WITH articleNO = #{articleNO} CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO )

insert.foreach: INTO t_imageFile(imageFileNO, imageFileName, articleNO, regDate) VALUES (#{item.imageFileNO}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.articleNO}, sysdate)
